column3: Description
6 Second Violations
An accurate pass from a wide position (via corners, open plays and set pieces) into a specific area in front of the goal. The pass must be touched next by a teammate of the crossing player.
Same as Accurate Crosses, but excludes corners
All accurate passes (excluding crosses)

Unsuccessful aerial duels (the definition of an aerial duel is that it is between two players - either both jumping or only one jumping and the other contesting the header by making it difficult to win - and one player has to win the contest with a header OR if it is between an outfield player and a goalkeeper then the goalkeeper is allowed to punch it clear)

Successful aerial duels (the definition of an aerial duel is that it is between two players - either both jumping or only one jumping and the other contesting the header by making it difficult to win - and one player has to win the contest with a header OR if it is between an outfield player and a goalkeeper then the goalkeeper is allowed to punch it clear)
Fantasy assists. These assists include ones from blocked shots, free kick goals, handballs won, own goal, passes lost, penalty kick goals, rebounds and shots off the post.
An official assist, as tracked by the official Premier League site. Fantasy assists (e.g. assists from rebounds) do not count.
If there was a 2nd assist, i.e a pass to create the opportunity for the player making the assist
Official Assists + Fantasy Assists
Assists Per 90 Minutes
Assists Per Game
A shot blocked by a defender and scored on the rebound.
A foul won that leads to a direct free kick scored.
A player forces a handball which results in a free kick scored.
A player shoots or passes, forcing a defender to put the ball in his own goal.
A heavily deflected pass.
An assist assigned to a player who wins a penalty which is taken and scored by a teammate.
A shot saved by the goalkeeper but scored on the rebound.
A shot that hits the post and is scored on the rebound.
When a player takes possession of a loose ball.
Passes which led to a clear cut scoring opportunity, e.g. one-on-one situation or a shot from just a few yards out.
Clear cut scoring opportunities which were not converted/scored.
Goals scored which were a clear cut chance
A cross blocked by the defender
Any goal attempt heading roughly on target toward goal which is blocked by a defender, where there are other defenders or a goalkeeper behind the blocker.
Awarded to a player who played at least 60 minutes and whose team gave up 0 goals that game.
Awarded to a player who played at least 60 minutes and whose team gave up 0 goals during the time the player was on the field, even if a goal was scored after the player left the field
Awarded to a defender who played at least 60 minutes and whose team gave up 0 goals that game. Only a player who plays as a Defender in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Awarded to a forward who played at least 60 minutes and whose team gave up 0 goals that game. Only a player who plays as a Forward in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Awarded to a midfielder who played at least 60 minutes and whose team gave up 0 goals that game. Only a player who plays as a Midfielder in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Awarded to an outfielder who played at least 60 minutes and whose team gave up 0 goals that game.
Total number of clearances attempted
Total number of clearances off line

A dribble past a player attempted (contests always involve 2 players) - doesn't include "overrun" situations where the attacking player takes on an opponent but the ball runs away from them out of play or to an opponent
Total corners taken (including short corners)
Total corners conceded by the defensive player/team
Total corners forced by the offensive player/team
Accurate corner distributions into the box - can include long balls if the corner kick is passed greater than 35 yards
ERG + OG + PKM + Pen + BCM
Total crosses attempted
Crosses Attempted - Accurate Crosses
Foul for play which could cause serious injury to an opponent
2 Points for 10 combined total of effective clearances, blocked shots, interceptions and tackles
TkW - Int - BS
TkW - Int - BS - CLR
TkW - Int - BS - CLR - BR
GAD*-2 + CSD*5 + CLR*0.5 + BC*2 + BS*2 + OG*-5 + Pen*-5 + ErG*-5
Fouls + (3 x Yellow Cards) + (6 x Red Cards)
Yellow Cards + (3 x Red Cards)
Dispossessed
Draws

Duel over the possession of the ball where a player loses the ball - doesn't include "overrun" situations where the attacking player takes on an opponent but the ball runs away from them out of play or to an opponent.

Duel over the possession of the ball where a player wins the ball - doesn't include "overrun" situations where the attacking player takes on an opponent but the ball runs away from them out of play or to an opponent.
Successful defensive clearance - where player under pressure kicks the ball clear of the defensive zone and/or out of play
An error that was deemed to be the cause of a goal against the team of the player who made the error
An error that was deemed to be the cause of a shot on goal against the team of the player who made the error
Fouls Committed
Fouls Committed Per Game
Fouls Suffered
Fouls Suffered Per Game
Goal from a direct free kick
Miss from a direct free kick
Total shots from direct free kicks
Games Played
Games Started
CS*7 + GA*-1 + HCS*2 + PKS*10 + Sv * 1
Goals
Goals conceded by the team while the goalkeeper was on the field. This only applies to the goalkeeper.
Average Goals Against per Game
Goals conceded by the team while the defender was on the field. Only a player who plays as a Defender in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Goals conceded by the team while the forward was on the field. Only a player who plays as a Forward in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Goal against from a shot inside the box
Goals conceded by the team while the midfielder was on the field. Only a player who plays as a Midfielder in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Goals conceded by the team while the player was on the field. Any outfielder will get credit for this stat.
Goal against from a shot outside the box
Goal from a shot inside the box
Goals scored by the team while the player is on the field
Goal from a shot outside the box
Goals Per 90 Minutes
Goals Per Game
Foul for handball
Player scores 3 goals in a game
Goalkeeper attempts to catch a cross
Goalkeeper catches a cross
Player intercepts a pass
Int + BS
Interception made within the box
Saves + Punches + High Claims succeeded + Smothers
Player assists a shot (including goals)
Long aerial kick from either a goalkeeper or a defender directly to an attacking player, with the ball generally bypassing the midfield.
Long accurate aerial kick from either a goalkeeper or a defender directly to an attacking player, with the ball generally bypassing the midfield,
A loss by the player's team. The player only gets credit for the loss if he plays 60+ min, and is on his team's official Active roster or he is suspended.
2 Points for 12 combined total of Ball Recoveries, effective clearances, blocked shots, interceptions and tackles
Tackles + Interceptions + Ball Recoveries.
Minutes Played
Minutes played of a player whose team had a cleansheet. For example, if he only played for two minutes, if his team got a cleansheet, the value of this stat would be 2.
Offsides
Offsides Per 90 Minutes
Offsides Per Game
Total goalkeeper one-on-one situations against an attacker
Goals scored on own net
Total attempted passes (excluding crosses, goal kicks, keeper throws and throw-ins)
Accurate Passes / Attempted Passes
Penalties conceded (including handballs)
Penalty Kick Goals
Penalty Kick Goals Against
Number of penalty kicks saved by the goalkeeper
Number of penalty kicks taken by the shooter
Player fouled within the penalty box (excludes any penalty kicks drawn for handballs)
Number of penalty kicks faced by the goalkeeper
Number of penalty kicks where the shooter did not score
Goals + Assists
Points Per 90 Minutes
Points Per Game
Total losses of possession
Total losses of possession excluding clearances & long GK distribution
Goalkeeper punches the ball clear from a high ball
If a player receives a red card and then has his red card rescinded at a later time, his red card will remain (i.e. he will have credit for both a red card and a red card rescinded).
Red card rescinded by the referee
Save Percentage
Saves
Saves Inside the Box
Saves Outside the Box
Second Yellow Cards
Shots on Target / Shots
Shots
Any shot against the goalkeeper, whether or not it missed the net
Shots conceded by the team while the defender was on the field. Only a player who plays as a Defender in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Shots conceded by the team while the forward was on the field. Only a player who plays as a Forward in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Shots conceded by the team while the midfielder was on the field. Only a player who plays as a Midfielder in his real-life game will get credit for this stat.
Shots conceded by the team while the player was on the field. Any outfielder will get credit for this stat.
Shots blocked (against the shooter)
Shots Per 90 Minutes
Shots Per Game
Shots off the Post
Shots on Target
Shots on Target Against
Shots on Target Per 90 Minutes
Shots on Target Per Game
Smothers
Substitutions Off
Substitutions On
Total dribbles where a player beats an opponent - no overruns

column2: Successful Dribbles (Contests Succeeded) + Plus Fouls Suffered
column3: Successful Dribbles (Contests Succeeded) + Plus Fouls Suffered
Total successful passes where the ball ends in the final third of the pitch (excluding throw-ins, keeper throws, goal kicks and crosses).
Total tackle attempts
When a player makes a defensive action/tackle and they are the last person between the opponent and the goal
Total tackles won (winning possession or putting the ball out of play)
Tackles Won + Blocked Shots
Tackles Won + Interceptions
The loss of possession of the ball.
A win by the player's team. The player only gets credit for the win if he plays 60+ min, and is on his team's official Active roster or he is suspended.
Yellow Cards
